    public class Button
extends Image
    Class used as a button on the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Button

        public Button(Panel parent)
        Construct a Button in the specified parent Panel.
        Parameters:
        parent - The Panel that is to be the parent of this Button.

      • Button

        public Button(Panel parent,
      Bundle bundle,
      int offset)
        Construct a Button in the specified parent Panel with the specified Bundle instance.
        Parameters:
        parent - The Panel that is to be the parent of this Button.
        bundle - The Bundle to use to store and render the Button.
        offset - The offset in the Bundle in which to add the Button. A Button takes up 12 values in the Bundle.
